title: F/S - T202 Cobb/Moriarity - Ty Cobb Steals Third - PSA VGEX
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: F/S - T202 Cobb/Moriarity - Ty Cobb Steals Third - PSA VGEX
posts.post_content:
For sale is this T202 Hassan Triple Folder - Ty Cobb / George Moriarity - Ty Cobb Steals Third. Card is graded by PSA as VGEX 4.  Great picture on this example with the red back.  Asking $3,250 which includes USPS priority plus insurance.  Mailed payment (check or money order) preferred but will take PayPal F&F. Please reply to [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].
